page.title: 12Playground Games
page.content:
LEAKY:-Leaky is like hide and seek except,when the person who is on spots one of the people who are hiding he runs back to a post and says,"Leaky David ,1,2,3,4,5."When everyone is caught,the person who was caught first is on and the game starts over again.
HOP-SCOTCH:-Hopscotch is another game that is marked on the playground.It is a fairly small game but many children can play as you take turns throwing a stone onto numbers.The numbers are written in squares and are from one to ten.You reach your chosen square by jumping and hopping to it.When you get to 10 you come back down until you reach 1 again.You are then allowed to pick one of the numbers for a bed and the other players have to avoid treading on it.
